title: Microsoft hits $3 trillion value, cementing strength of AI rally
text: The stock rose as much as 1.3% to $403.95, resulting in a market capitalization of $3 trillion. The threshold cements Microsoft’s status as one of the largest public stocks. It briefly surpassed Apple Inc. in value — which last year became the first company to hit $3 trillion — but subsequently dropped back below the iPhone maker, with the two trading places ever since. Zuckerberg said general intelligence was now his company's goal, largely to help attract the best engineers in the fast expanding AI field.
